name: Celestial "Tres Amigos"
description: Dedicated to my father, who was diagnosed with Renal Cell Carcinoma. He survived 5 years longer than what he was told; his body finally gave out in 2017. This was inspired by a photograph that I took the last time my dad saw his brothers. Sadly, 2/3 of the Amigos have crossed on from this plane to the next. I created this a way of coping and accepting my grief
